name: Winter Feud
description:
Winter  Feud 

is a small local multiplayer game. 1 Player attempts to deliver 50 gifts to spread Christmas cheer while the other player attempts to destroy the gifts before they reach the houses.

To Play 

all you need is a keyboard and a mouse. Player 1 may use the WASD keys or Arrow Keys to move can drop presents using the Space bar. 

Player 2 moves via the mouse and destroys presents by touching them.

To Win, Player 1 will need to deliver 50 presents out of a total of a 100 successfully, but Player 2 can win by destroying enough presents to make it impossible for Player 1 to deliver 50.

Credits 

Winter Feud was made completely by me except for the 

Sound effects were made using Sfxr and the music which was found in the Christmas Music Pack - https://void1gaming.itch.io/christmas-music-pack
